ing: 1 (46 ounce) can tomato-vegetable juice cocktail (such as V8Â®)
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TELÂ®)
des: "This is a wonderful pink sauce that's got a spicy kick.  It's simple to make and is perfect for pasta dishes."
ins: Pour the tomato-vegetable juice cocktail into a large saucepan.  Whisk in the tomato paste. Stir in the tomatoes; bring to a simmer over medium-high heat.  Simmer sauce until hot, about 10 minutes. Just before serving, remove from heat and stir in cream.
